pullRequest.title: Use a PrintWriter to make printf available.
pullRequest.bodyText:
Otherwise we have to call String.format. This also fixes a place where
we weren't in fact calling String.format even though we were using the
%n format specifier.

commit.message:
Use a PrintWriter to make printf available.

Otherwise we have to call String.format. This also fixes a place where
we weren't in fact calling String.format even though we were using the
%n format specifier.
